name: Segment
description: Receive Events from Segment, send updated data to Segment

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Filter users
private_settings.description: Only send Users matching one or more of these segments. Sends everyone if empty.

private_settings.name: synchronized_properties
private_settings.title: Properties sent to Segment.com
private_settings.description: Select User properties sent to Segment.com. Sends nothing if empty.

private_settings.name: forward_events
private_settings.title: Forward Events received from Segment
private_settings.description: Re-send events we received from Segment.com. Use ONLY if Segment source and Destination are different.

settings.name: write_key
settings.title: Write Key
settings.description: Segment Write Key, found in Project Settings > Keys

settings.name: handle_pages
settings.title: Handle Pages
settings.description: Store analytics.page() events. Can generate a lot of volume

settings.name: handle_screens
settings.title: Handle Screens
settings.description: Store analytics.screen() events. Can generate a lot of volume

settings.name: public_id_field
settings.title: Public ID Field
settings.description: User field to use as the userId field for data sent to segment

settings.name: handle_groups
settings.title: Handle Groups
settings.description: Handle group attributes as user traits, prefixed with 'group/'
